title: SCP-8420
content:
====
[[include :scp-wiki:component:preview
text=
HUZZAH!
]]
=====
[[=]]
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:start-standalone]]
[[=]]
Nonagon infinity
Nonagon infinity
Nonagon infinity
Is coming
@@ @@
(Road Train - King Gizzard and the Lizard Wizard)
@@ @@
SCP-8420 - [[span class="ruby"]]巫师II[[span class="rt"]]THE WIZARD II[[/span]][[/span]]（又名[[span class="ruby"]]巫师重生2[[span class="rt"]]Wizard Reborn 2[[/span]][[/span]]、[[span class="ruby"]]天鹅热[[span class="rt"]]Swann Fever[[/span]][[/span]]、[[span class="ruby"]]天鹅湖歌谣[[span class="rt"]]Ballad of the Swann Lake[[/span]][[/span]]、[[span class="ruby"]]电子大道[[span class="rt"]]Electric Avenue[[/span]][[/span]]、[[span class="ruby"]]清算[[span class="rt"]]the Reckoning[[/span]][[/span]]、[[span class="ruby"]]蠢驴的复仇[[span class="rt"]]Revenge of the Dumbass[[/span]][[/span]]、[[span class="ruby"]]东京漂移[[span class="rt"]]Tokyo Drift[[/span]][[/span]]、[[span class="ruby"]]多边兽波加洛舞[[span class="rt"]]Porygon Boogaloo[[/span]][[/span]]、[[span class="ruby"]]这次是私人的[[span class="rt"]]This Time it's Personnel[[/span]][[/span]]、[[span class="ruby"]]巫师更难：巫师星球复仇崛起的回归[[span class="rt"]]Wizard Harder: Return of the Rise of the Revenge of the Planet of the Wizard[[/span]][[/span]]等等）

@@ @@
由[[*user Troutmaskreplica]]，[[*user twibz]]，[[*user dtheaussie]]，[[*user rhineriver]]还有[[*user DrowningDutchman]]制作。

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/trouts-authorpage Troutmaskreplica的作者页]

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/rhineriver Rhineriver的作者页]

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/drowningdutchman-author-page DrowningDutchman的作者页]

DtheAussie和twibz暂时还没有作者页。伤心！

[https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Kaleidoskop.jpg 图片1]

图片2和3由Rhineriver制作

[https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Bsodwindows10.png 图片4]

巫师塔归功于[[[SCP-6289]]]

[[/=]]
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:end-standalone]]
[[/=]]
